clean()[source]¶

Hook for doing any extra form-wide cleaning after Field.clean() has been called on every field. Any ValidationError raised by this method will not be associated with a particular field; it will have a special-case association with the field named ‘__all__’.

base_fields = {'deception': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'deception_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'negativity': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'negativity_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'risk': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'risk_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'stressful': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'stressful_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - If deception is set to yes, make sure deception_details has been filled out - If negativity is set to yes, make sure negativity_details has been filled out - If stressful is set to yes, make sure stressful_details has been filled out - If risk is set to yes, make sure risk_details has been filled out

base_fields = {'age_groups': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'compensation': <django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField object>, 'compensation_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'has_traits': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'legally_incapable': <django.forms.fields.BooleanField object>, 'legally_incapable_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'necessity': <django.forms.fields.TypedChoiceField object>, 'necessity_reason': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'passive_consent': <django.forms.fields.NullBooleanField object>, 'passive_consent_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'recruitment': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'recruitment_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>, 'traits': <django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField object>, 'traits_details': <django.forms.fields.CharField object>}¶
clean()[source]¶

Check for conditional requirements: - Check whether necessity was required - Check all passive_consent fields are filled in correctly when needed - Check that legally_incapable has a value - If legally_incapable is set, make sure the details are filled - Check that has_traits has a value - If has_traits is checked, make sure there is at least one trait selected - If a trait which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a compensation which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled - If a recruitment which needs details has been checked, make sure the details are filled

declared_fields = {}¶
media¶
necessity_required(cleaned_data)[source]¶

Check whether necessity_reason was required and if so, if it has been filled out.

passive_consent(cleaned_data)[source]¶

Checks whether the passive consent fields are filled in correctly
